title: Space in the seventies: exploration of the planets
creator_credit: Colin Cantwell, Lester Novros, Graphic Films and National Aeronautics and Space Administration
brief_description: This film very briefly covers the early notions we had about space, and then progresses to actual data collected from space flights to the Moon, Mars and Saturn. Information and findings are presented by artists’ impressions, animation, and computer printouts. Suitable for upper secondary level.
